item.content:encoded:
Quick reminder on the Facebook Garage Belfast.

The event is on Monday, October 12, 2009 from 3:00 PM at The Black Box, Hill St, Belfast

Andy McMillan (twitter:goodonpaper) is the local hosting/organizing the event, with great support from Elaine Thompson at InvestNI

If youâ€™re interested in attending, participating, talking, etc please sign up and check the Facebook Page

item.title: Facebook Garage Ireland in Belfast
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: After the success of the Facebook Garage Ireland events in Dublin, we’re now heading out of Dublin. First up is Belfast. The event is on Monday, October 12, 2009 from 3:00 PM at The Black Box, Hill St, Belfast Thanks to Andy McMillan (twitter:goodonpaper) who is hosting/organizing the event. We also have great support from [...]
item.content:encoded:
After the success of the Facebook Garage Ireland events in Dublin, we’re now heading out of Dublin.

First up is Belfast. The event is on Monday, October 12, 2009 from 3:00 PM at The Black Box, Hill St, Belfast

Thanks to Andy McMillan (twitter:goodonpaper) who is hosting/organizing the event. We also have great support from Elaine Thompson at InvestNI

If you’re interested in attending, participating, talking, etc please sign up and check the Facebook Page
